TopicTitle: [1.1.2]Aerojet Kerbodyne 3.0 (4/29/16 Better FX, still good for 1.1.2)

Articles.Content:
Blackheart, may I ask when you're gonna fix the FX on the engine?

EDIT: To be more specific, I have a couple suggestions:

1) Modify the coding thingamajig so that the flame doesn't point towards the retrograde vector (That's what it looks like) and point straight out the engine, because I think that's more realistic.

2) Modify the behavior so that the FX appears to be shooting out during the orbital insertion burn and more energetic. The burns are fine, just that the FX looks like a limp noodle. Make it shoot out. This is what I mean:

Edited May 26, 2014 by AppleDavidJeans

Blackheart, may I ask when you're gonna fix the FX on the engine?

EDIT: To be more specific, I have a couple suggestions:

1) Modify the coding thingamajig so that the flame doesn't point towards the retrograde vector (That's what it looks like) and point straight out the engine, because I think that's more realistic.

2) Modify the behavior so that the FX appears to be shooting out during the orbital insertion burn. The burns are fine, just that the FX looks like a limp noodle. Make it shoot out. This is what I mean:

http://i.gyazo.com/494352f5ca5bcf5bb42b949e803d2d13.gif

I definitely agree
Easily one of the most enjoyable addons around. Looks awesome.
Well, I really need to fix that. I'm not rushing the patches for the mods I have because I don't want quality to be left out. So I'll just promise that it will be fixed soontm
Im about to fix the FX on the engines, and I added one WIP at the moment that has its FX completely done, no texture yet for the model though.
That looks to be a fun ride. Can't wait! (Well, I can and will wait, but you know what I mean.)
Yay! A BPC for the Taurus!

That looks to be a fun ride. Can't wait! (Well, I can and will wait, but you know what I mean.)

If what I'm thinking is what you're thinking, I guess so? Haha

Thanks for understanding. I am scratching up some of the things I left.

Here is the service module of Taurus without engines yet, I am not sure if I will release the engine with it (once I find it-I don't remember if it is done already or not)

This houses 2.5m engines so just need to find the better looking or the more efficient one, I'm adjusting the configs for this part at the moment.

There might be a release after a couple days.

Yay (10char)

Hurrah I had time today to edit, map and even import the existing fairly new engine model from some weeks back that I made. It's actually a real service module now. Just need an adapter. That I will do if I actually have time to make stuff (I'm trying to free up some time). Meanwhile...

So here are the two parts I will introduce to *almost* complete the set for taurus.

BTW the engine is not working at all, but the emissives are. I don't have time to do it anymore unfortunately so I'll do it some time later.
